descriptionHtml:
[b][quote][color=#ff0000][size=6][center]
SEEEEEE VIDEOOOOS[/center][/size][/color][/quote][/b]

adds Voldmort's robes and shoes with 3 option: of Master Destruction robe, hooded Archmage robe  and no enchantment.

if you have one "Linen Wrap" in bag, can craft robes or shoes at tanning rack. 

Recipes will not be shown without linen. linens can be obtained at Nordic ruins or via console, player.additem 34cd6 1 and crafting stuffs.

or you can get them with

help voldemort 4

and

player.additem codes counts


I DO KNOW these wears doesn't work properly in some stances, but no further plan for fix.

so do whatever you want with them without permission.  
[quote][center][color=#ffff00]
OF COURSE YOU NEED INSTALL THESE FIRST
[/color]robes moves properly only when these stuffs are installed[/center][/quote]

HDT PHYSICS EXTENSION 

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?




SKSE


http://skse.silverlock.org/
author: goldiocks
